item.description:
M.W. George Washington Carver Grand Lodge at the Russell Auditorium, Carver Den AF + AM

The group of men who sit in the corner every week and watch us are members of the Carver Den.
The Den has requested The Original Steppers of Boston 2006 Inc. kick off their New Years Eve Celebration December 31, 2010 at 8 p.m.
by arriving early and start their evening event with Steppin' they are excited about our participation and want to create an air of sophistication with a classy atmosphere and request we showcase Steppin'!!
They promised to play Steppin Music for this event


The event will host 3 rooms of entertainment with Old Skool, Hip Hop, and Reggae.
Champagne Midnight Toast.
Hors d' oeuvres, hats, noise makers

TICKETS $10 BEFORE 12/15/2010 AFTER 12/15/2010 TICKETS WILL BE $30

Please RSVP and see Steve for $10 Tickets before 12/15/2010

Please note they have also invited us to their Summer Cruise 2011






They have requested we arrive early and stand out and wear our Club Tee Shirts. (optional)

Tickets are $10 before 12/15/10 and the price will increase to $30 after 12/15/10

Start off your evening celebrations early and help promote the dance

..

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: New Year's Eve For 2011
